long_description: black sea jewelers mission is to provide our customers with "fair market value" in exchange for any unwanted rare coins, platinum, gold, silver, diamond, jewelry and collectables. we strive to deliver the highest quality of customer service each and every day. hand crafted precious metalwork, which is used in the creation of stan deyo's garden of eden jewelry collection by black sea jewelers. our services include designing, creating and repairing jewels as well as selling timepieces. black sea jewelers is the areas' only full service jewelry boutique where every aspect involved in jewelry making and servicing is done in-house. repair, re-sizing, gold and platinum plating, stone setting, precious metal and stone exchange. custom jewelry design modeled using state of the art cad software; literally anything you can imagine can be created by our professionally certified cad designer. we also have a gia certified gemologist on staff to offer accurate appraisals for all gems and precious metals.

generated_description: black sea jewelers is a full-service jewelry boutique that specializes in creating unique pieces of jewelry to match the exact taste of their customers. they offer a range of services including designing, creating, and repairing jewelry, as well as selling timepieces and buying gold and silver. they are an authorized dealer of the full seiko luxe line, including seiko, astron, and marinemaster. black sea jeweler's mission is to provide their customers with "fair market value" in exchange for any unwanted rare coins, platinum, gold, silver, diamond, jewelry, and collectibles. they use state-of-the-art cad software to create custom jewelry designs and have a gia certified gemologist on staff to offer accurate appraisals for all gems and precious metals. the owner is also a certified jewelry making instructor, professionally trained in europe's finest precious metal-working institutes.
